title: Cassiopeia & Gromp smite passive interaction
body:
What are peoples thoughts on the interaction of gromps buff from being smout and cassiopeia's passive? Whenever she is attacked it poisons targets but with regards to champions it doesn't actually count for stacks when she is poisoning the target via the gromp passive. Is this actually working correctly as is or should she actually gain stacks? She is the source of the poison effect after all.

I've been contemplating the stupidity of trying to Cassiopeia jungle just for the fun and as an experiment however the inability to stack her poison off anything except the minion kills makes things very difficult.

But that's not how her passive works, it work by poison applied by her abilities, not from any source. So it's working as intended.

Well for one, you dont need to junlge cassiopeia to take smite in order to get the buff
